summary_md: Monaco, a sovereign city-state, offers a high standard of living with a per capita GDP (224,582 USD per person). The average life expectancy (86.37 years) is relatively high, indicating a healthy environment. With a significant portion of the population using the internet (99.10%), the country is well-connected digitally. The small size and wealth of Monaco make it an attractive destination for various demographics.

sections.economy_md: Monaco's economy is characterized by a high per capita GDP (224,582 USD per person), reflecting its affluent status.
sections.labor_md: The average life expectancy (86.37 years) suggests a robust health environment, potentially contributing to a productive workforce.
sections.digital_md: A considerable percentage of the population is internet users (99.10%), indicating a strong digital presence.
sections.health_env_md: The high average life expectancy (86.37 years) points to a favorable health environment in Monaco.
